entry.title: [RBX3][DedicatedServers] - Rack 45C07
entry.content:
Jul 31, 18:57 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 31/07/2023 18:24 UTC
End Time : 31/07/2023 18:32 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 31, 18:27 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 31/07/2023 18:24 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack 45C07 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][DedicatedServers] - CentOS 7 CPanel EoL
entry.content:
Jul 31, 00:27 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 27, 15:38 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 27, 15:34 UTC
Scheduled - End time : 31/07/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : centos7-cpanel won't be available for installation any more
Related Documentation : cPanel Deprecation Plan

Starting with version 112, cPanel & WHM no longer support CentOS 7. We will no longer offer centos7-cpanel-latest for installation after 2023-07-31.
Customers are advised to install alma8-cpanel-latest instead.

entry.title: [RBX5][Public Network/Dedicated servers] - 45C14
entry.content:
Jul 30, 13:59 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 30/07/2023 13:02 UTC
End Time :30/07/2023 13:45 UTC
Root cause :Public network was unreachable for some servers on this rack.
It was due to a malfunction on the power suply.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [RBX6][Network] - vRack - Rooms 46C, 46D, 46E
entry.content:
Jul 29, 21:24 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 29/07/2023 21:04 UTC
End time : 29/07/2023 21:17 UTC
Root Cause : Network equipment malfunction
An unexpected reload of a network equipment impacted vRack networks of rooms 46C, 46D, and 46E.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
